title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.4 - Application for stevedore license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.4 - Application for stevedore license

State Regulations
A license to act as a stevedore will be issued only upon a
verified application submitted on a form furnished by the commission. Each
application for a stevedore license shall be accompanied by a personal
character information form furnished by the commission, completed and verified
by the applicant, by each member of a partnership, and, if the applicant is a
corporation, by each officer, each director and each natural person holding, directly or indirectly, five percent or more of any class of capital stock. The
commission may, upon examination, require such additional evidence and
information as may be required to establish the character of the real parties
in interest. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
3.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
